22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"
24 #include "TestMacros.h"
25 #include <catch.hpp>
26 #include <Eigen/Dense>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 using namespace Eigen;
31 
32 
33 TEST_CASE("Sum of species energies equals mixture energies",
34  "[thermodynamics]"
35 )
36 {
37  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon()*1000;
38  const int e_var_set = 0;
39  const int t_var_set = 1;
40 
41  MIXTURE_LOOP
42  (
43  const int ns = mix.nSpecies();
44  const int nt = mix.nEnergyEqns();
45 
46  std::vector<double> tmps1(nt);
47  std::vector<double> tmps2(nt);
48 
49  Eigen::ArrayXd rhoi(ns);
50  Eigen::ArrayXd species_energies(ns*nt);
51  Eigen::ArrayXd mixture_energies(nt);
52 
53  EQUILIBRATE_LOOP
54  (
55  // Get the species densities
56  double rho = mix.density();
57  rhoi = rho * Eigen::Map<const Eigen::ArrayXd>(mix.Y(), ns);
58 
59  // Get a nominal temperature vector
60  tmps1.assign(nt, T);
61 
62  // Compute a randomly perturbed temperature vector +- 500K
63  for (int i = 0; i < nt; ++i)
64  tmps1[i] += double(rand()) / RAND_MAX * 1000.0 - 500.0;
65 
66  // Set the state with the densities and perturbed temperatures
67  mix.setState(rhoi.data(), &tmps1[0], t_var_set);
68 
69  // Check
70  mix.getEnergiesMass(species_energies.data());
71  mix.mixtureEnergies(mixture_energies.data());
72 
73  for (int i = 0; i < nt; ++i)
74  CHECK(rho * mixture_energies[i] ==
75  Approx((rhoi*species_energies.segment(i*ns, ns)).sum()));
76  )
77  )
78 }
